transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Helllo?
Executive: Haan sir bataiye.
Customer: Haan ji mam, mai Aryan bol raha tha. Mam aapko is month ki agar mai baat karu, to aapko mam lagbhag 68 inquiries aayi hai.
Hmm.
Executive: Haan ji mam. To aur mam aapko jo call aayi hai, wo aayi hai aapko four four calls aayi hai, four nahi 19 aur four 23 mam aapko call aayi hai is month.
Hmm.
Executive: Aur plus aapko abhi inquiry ka jo flow hai mam isme mam issue kya aa raha hai mam? nahi mil raha hai ya mam kya issue aa raha hai aapko?
Customer: Sir issue yahi aa raha hai ki hamara jo pehle tha sir aap dekhiyega agar August September ka dekhenge aur compare kariyega idhar to dono me bahut jyada differences hai.
Executive: Aap August September September raha.
Customer: Haan sir. Pehle inquiries dekhiye sir number of inquiries jyada hai, abka dekhiye dono me bahut kam differences hai. To kya mujhe samajh nahi aa raha hai jo account handle kar rahe hai wo sahi se nahi handle kar rahe hai ki kya issue hai. Sir ek to mujhe samajh hi nahi aa raha hai manager hamesha change hote rehte hai. Commitment kaun kiya rehta hai, baat kis se hoti hai, to ye proper guide kar hi nahi pa raha hai.
Executive: Mam aapka jo account manager hai wo mai hu Aryan aur mera jo nahi hai sir.
Executive: Mam aapko October me 200 inquiry aayi thi.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Is mahine mam thoda inquiry ka flow abhi mam thoda kam hai IndiaMART pe. Is month ki mam bata raha hu.
Aapke product ki mam ek baar visibility check kar leta hu kitni kya hai aapki goods.
Wo bhi mam okay hai isme to dikh raha hai.
Hmm.
Executive: Yaha bhi mam cheeze bilkul okay hai, koi issue nahi mere ko nazar aa raha. Abhi mam inquiry ka mam baat karu to abhi kya hai na jitni aapke usme aani chahiye, abhi thodi kam hai mam sach batau to, abhi thodi kam hai mam is baar. Is month me thodi kam hai 68 hai aur next month mam thoda ye badh jayegi.
Customer: Sir aap aise bol diye to bolne pe nahi na hai sir. Bolne pe to hum nahi na ja sakte hai.
Bolne me to ye bhi bola gaya tha jab ye TrustSeal hum log ne liya tha ye bola gaya tha ki aap le rahe hai to aapka ye samajh jaaiye ki aapka bahut achcha sale hoga. Lekin nahi ho raha hai na sir. Ye bhavna humko kaha se fasa kar chali gayi hai, bol ke kya gayi hai, samajh hi nahi aa raha hai mujhe.
Executive: Mam inquiry me abhi mam jo hai wo mam aapko 68 aapko inquiries aayi thi. Last month mam manta hu aapko thodi jyada aayi hai, usse last September me aapko 230 inquiry aayi thi. Is month mam thoda flow kam hai mam inquiry ka to be honest. Mam aap next month tak ye thoda mam changes aayenge. Next month me mam thoda jyada ho jayega.
Customer: Sir reason kya hai kam hone ka?
Executive: Reason mam market me business ke mam darasal kya hai na kya mam?
Customer: Sir ye season hi hai marketing ka.
Executive: Season ka season hi hai.
Customer: Yahi season hai.
Han sir.
Jo hamara sir saal bhar me ye jo November, December, January rehta hai yahi kehte hai daba ke sale hota hai.
Hmm.
Executive: Abhi bhi kam hai.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Ye total kitne isme pass ho rahi hai zara dekh leta hu.
Total kar diya 644.
Approved.
Executive: Mam aap bylead vagaira consume karte hai isme jyada?
Customer: Haan bylead consume karte hai. Aap dekhe honge koi bhi aisa bylead nahi hoga jo hum logo ne consume nahi kiya hoga. Genuine bylead hum consume karte hai. Baki jo worth it nahi lagta nahi karte.
Executive: Bylead me mam sath me sab 30 din active hai. Mam agar mai 30 din me se baat karu to sirf 12 din aap active hai. Lekin ab jo last ke jo aap 90 days jo the na teen isse pichle se pichle mahine waha pe mam aap kafi jyada tez matlab active thi.
Hmm.
Executive: Bylead mam abhi aapne consume karna mam kam kar diya hai. Kya mam reason tha iska?
Customer: Sir bylead tabhi na consume karenge jab wo genuine product ho, genuine customer ho aur GST verify nahi rehta to hum log jyada focus hi nahi karte kyuki GST verify nahi hai to hum koi bhi goods bina GST verify ke nahi de sakte hai.
Executive: Mam wo to depend karta hai na wo to ho sakta hai wo hamare yaha as a buyer matlab as a seller yaha par registered na ho isiliye uska GST verified aapko na show ho raha ho.
Customer: First nahi rehta hai sir. First priority hamara yahi rehta hai jo hamara product hai usme wo byleads hai ki nahi aur uska number of quantity kya hai.
Executive: Mam hot water teddy mam aapke matlab relevant hai?
Customer: Haan hai sir lekin quantity bataiye kya hai do quantity 100 piece.
100 piece ka to maine kar liya hai.
Executive: Aapne ye wala kar liya consume hot water teddy?
Customer: Ye Rajkot Gujarat wali baat kar rahe hai.
Executive: Nahi Lucknow Uttar Pradesh.
Customer: Wo maine kar liya hai.
Executive: Lucknow Uttar Pradesh ki aapne kar li?
Hmm.
Executive: Aur ye hai hemoglobin recent me aapke isme check karta hu.
Hot water teddy, airbag, hemoglobin, sugar test 50 piece, minimum 100 ek piece.
Hmm 10 piece. 100 pe light globe gloves ke hai 128 piece. Bulb ke liye dekhni padegi. Order value above 10000.
Mam aap apna ek na product ka mere ko naam batao pehle. Matlab matlab wo kaun sa product hai isme sabse jyada aapko matlab chahiye hota hai.
Customer: Acu check active aur kya mam? Product ka naam batao mere ko.
Acua check active strip 50.
Executive: Spelling batao mere ko. A double C U A double C U C H C H C K C K space active 50.
Executive: Check kar abhi ruko mam line pe hi raho mam.
Customer: Kya kar rahe ho?
Executive: Acu checker sugar test syrup.
Acua check sugar sugar test strip.
Customer: Garam nahi.
Executive: Mam ye counter plus mam abhi abhi maine jo dala hai Acu check sugar test strip pe dala hua hai maine jisme counter plus glucometer test strip ki ek lead dikh rahi hai. Aapko pata hai uske bare me? Aapne consume ki thi kya?
Customer: Kiski sir?
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan ji mam ye ek maine abhi na Acu check sugar test strip ki abhi dala hua tha isme. To iska na abhi ek lead dikh rahi thi counter plus glucometer test strip.
Patna Bihar ki mam.
summary:
Concerns:

- Inquiries and sales are lower than expected.

- Account managers keep changing frequently.

- Doubts about the effectiveness of TrustSeal.

- Dissatisfied with the quality of buyleads.



Resolution:

- Executive checked product visibility; found it okay.

- Executive acknowledged lower inquiry flow this month.

- Executive mentioned the possibility of increased inquiries next month.

- Executive explained potential reasons for lower GST verification.



Next Steps: 

- Executive checked for relevant buyleads.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, trustseal, inquiries, account manager

seller_categories.mcat_name: Dr Morepen Blood Glucose Test Strips
